content.question: The position of the car at times <math alttext="1 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, <math alttext="2 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, is <math alttext="3 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math> are <math alttext="x sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="x sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="x sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>, respectively. Which of the following correctly ranks <math alttext="x sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="x sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="x sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> from greatest to least?

choices.label: <math alttext="x sub 1, is greater than x sub 2, which is greater than x sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x sub 3, is greater than x sub 2, which is greater than x sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x sub 2, is greater than x sub 3, which is greater than x sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x sub 1, is greater than x sub 3, which is greater than x sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x sub 3, is greater than x sub 2, which is greater than x sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
